## English perception

```{r}
# label binarizer
data = df %>%
  filter(lang_profile!="mono") %>%
  mutate(response_onehot = case_when(response_binary=="pen"~0,
                                    response_binary=="ult"~1),
         formant_jit = jitter(formant_center, amount=.001),
         spectilt_jit = jitter(spectilt_center, amount=.001),
         duration_jit = jitter(duration_center, amount=.001))
head(data)
```


```{r}
formula = "response_onehot ~ formant_jit*spectilt_jit*duration_jit*pc1 + formant_jit*spectilt_jit*duration_jit*pc2 + (formant_jit*spectilt_jit*duration_jit|partID)"

priors <- get_prior(formula,data,family=bernoulli())

model <- brm(formula=bf(formula,autocor = ~ 0),data=data, family=bernoulli(), 
            prior=priors, cores = 8, save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE), iter=4000)
```

Save or load model

```{r}
save(model, file="data/eng_tri_model.Rdata")
#load("data/eng_all_model.Rdata")
```

Examine results

```{r}
summary(model)
bayes_R2(model)
```

Visualize results

```{r}
posterior <- as.array(model)  # prepare to plot the brm result
dim(posterior)
dimnames(posterior)$variable[1:50]
```

```{r}
coeff_plot = mcmc_areas(posterior, pars = c("b_formant_jit", "b_spectilt_jit", "b_duration_jit", "b_pc1", "b_pc2", "b_formant_jit:spectilt_jit", "b_formant_jit:duration_jit", "b_spectilt_jit:duration_jit", "b_formant_jit:pc1", "b_spectilt_jit:pc1", "b_duration_jit:pc1", "b_formant_jit:pc2", "b_spectilt_jit:pc2", "b_duration_jit:pc2", "b_formant_jit:spectilt_jit:duration_jit", "b_formant_jit:spectilt_jit:pc1", "b_formant_jit:duration_jit:pc1", "b_spectilt_jit:duration_jit:pc1", "b_formant_jit:spectilt_jit:pc2", "b_formant_jit:duration_jit:pc2", "b_spectilt_jit:duration_jit:pc2", "b_formant_jit:spectilt_jit:duration_jit:pc1", "b_formant_jit:spectilt_jit:duration_jit:pc2"), 
          prob = 0.8, # 80% intervals
          prob_outer = 0.95, # 95%
          point_est = "median") +
  xlim(-2,2)+
scale_y_discrete(labels=c("Vowel quality:Spectral tilt:Duration:PC2", "Vowel quality:Spectral tilt:Duration:PC1", "Spectral tilt:Duration:PC2", "Vowel quality:Duration:PC2", "Vowel quality:Spectral tilt:PC2", "Spectral tilt:Duration:PC1","Vowel quality:Duration:PC1", "Vowel quality:Spectral tilt:PC1", "Vowel quality:Spectral tilt:Duration", "Duration:PC2", "Spectral tilt:PC2", "Vowel quality:PC2", "Duration:PC1", "Spectral tilt:PC1", "Vowel quality:PC1", "Spectral tilt:Duration", "Vowel quality:Duration", "Vowel quality:Spectral tilt", "PC2", "PC1", "Duration", "Spectral tilt", "Vowel quality"), limits=rev) +
  labs(title = "Coefficients of trilingual English perception", x ="Coefficient, sd(Oxtyone Stress)") +theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust = 0.5))
coeff_plot
```

```{r}
data %>%
  select(pc2)%>%
  summarize(mean = mean(pc2),
            low_sd = mean(pc2)-sd(pc2),
            high_sd = mean(pc2)+sd(pc2))
  
```

```{r}
conditions = data.frame(pc2 = c(-2.528, 0.012, 2.553))
cat_vowel_spec_pc2 = conditional_effects(model, effects = "formant_jit:spectilt_jit", conditions = conditions)
```

```{r}
cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot = plot(cat_vowel_spec_pc2, plot = FALSE)[[1]] + labs(title = "Catalan perception", x = "Vowel quality steps", y = "Proportion stressed") +
  guides(color=guide_legend(title="Spectral tilt steps"), fill = 'none') +
  scale_color_discrete(breaks = c(-1.15, 0, 1.15),
    labels=c('-1 SD', 'mean', '+1 SD')
    )+
  theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust = 0.5), legend.position = "bottom")

cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot$data$cond__ <- ifelse(cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot$data$cond__ == "1", "PC2 (-1 SD)",
ifelse(cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot$data$cond__ == "2", "PC2 (mean)",
ifelse(cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot$data$cond__ == "3", "PC2 (+1 SD)", 99)))


cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot$data$cond__ <- factor(cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot$data$cond__, levels = c("PC2 (-1 SD)", "PC2 (mean)", "PC2 (+1 SD)"))

cat_vowel_spec_pc2_plot
```
